documents.documentName: Revised Lochsa River Subbasin TMDL Approval
documents.documentComments: On July 10, 2020, the Idaho Department of Environmental Quality (IDEQ) requested that the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) amend its August 27, 2018, approval of the 2012 Lochsa River Subbasin Total Maximum Daily Loads (Lochsa TMDLs). This request was made because IDEQ originally requested approval of TMDLs for 31 unlisted assessment units (AUs) that it has subsequently determined do not have sufficient information demonstrating temperature impairment.
